dict.string: Search TVRage for the show of your choice. Returns information about the show in subtitle
Enable 12-hour time (ex. 8:00 PM) for the TV Rage Workflow
Enable 24-hour time (ex. 20:00) for the TV Rage Workflow

Welcome to the TVRage Alfred Workflow ===================================== ### Version 0.12
This workflow is currently setup to run based on the tv keyword. It queries TVRage and returns information on the show. If you are using a hotkey, it will pass your current selection in OS X into the workflow. ![Alfred Workflow Example](http://i.imgur.com/2cwW7IB.png)
Returning Series: ----------------- [*SHOW_NAME*] is a returning series. It is aired on [*AIR DAY*] at [*AIR TIME*] on [*TV NETWORK*].
Canceled/Ended Series: ---------------------- [*SHOW_NAME*] is canceled/ended. It ran for [*NUMBER OF SEASONS*] season(s) on [*TV NETWORK*].
TBD/On The Bubble Series: ---------------------- [*SHOW_NAME*] is on the bubble for being renewed. If it is renewed, it airs on [*AIR DAY*] at [*AIR TIME*] on [*TV NETWORK*].
Use of the Workflow =================== This workflow can be called by the keyword "tv [*TV SHOW NAME*]". This will query the TVRage database and return results based on your query.
